name: Get out of my controller!
description:
Made for GMTK  Gam Jam 2020. The viruses are trying to sabotage your controller! Try to stop them.

Features:

Three different towers with upgrades

Melee the viruses by smashing them with the stick

Eight builtin waves, with unlimited randomly generated waves after that.

(Export went wrong, the icons for the towers are all the same.)

Made in 48 hours, all sprites and sounds are by me. (16 years old)
